title: Kinda Feudy is kinda intense 😳 #shorts
description:

transcript_chunks.text: i asked the kind of funny audience to name a rhythm game played with a peripheral accessory dance stands revolution bear down at you 30 points rock band tim that'll let you 40 points what congratulations god damn it andy that'll net you 50 points pear what's your next guess donkey konga barrett that'll net you 20 points oh wow so i'm gonna go with what i think the number five is which is dj hero doesn't that you zero points dj heroes not on the list oh andy you're our actual final guest beat saber andy they'll let you ten point speed there's no peripheral the the console is the peripheral no the console is the console
